title: Conduct Unbecoming
description: In this Dateline classic, a family in Ontario, Canada returns home to discover some of their personal items are missing. Was it a random attack, or something more sinister? Keith Morrison reports. Originally aired on NBC on February 18, 2011.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
